title: Skins not loading in Team Builder.
body: I have been a friend of team builder since it was released and I've recently gotten into buying skins. This doesn't happen very often but when playing in team builder sometimes the skin you have selected doesn't end up selected in game. I was reminded about this just recently trying to use the {{champion:236}} Chroma pack. I've tried selecting the colors, which I do successfully, and they don't load in game. kthxbi

replies.body: same happened to me, once you have selected your champ and got into your team, before you get into the game click your skin again, it should work.
